trans-unit.target: 指定的使用者定義的索引標籤的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabProperties"></xref> class by specifying tab properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabProperties"></xref>藉由指定索引標籤內容的類別。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabAlignment"></xref> that represents the alignment of text at the tab location.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabAlignment"> </xref> ，代表文字的索引標籤位置的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the tab location.
An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the tab leader.
An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the specific character in text that is aligned at tab location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，表示對齊位置 索引標籤的文字中的特定字元。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the specific character in the text that is aligned at the specified tab location.
trans-unit.target: 取得特定字元的索引中指定的索引標籤的位置對齊的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the alignment style of the text at the tab location.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字的對齊樣式 索引標籤的位置。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabAlignment"></xref> that represents the alignment of the text at the tab location.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabAlignment"></xref>代表的索引標籤位置的文字的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index value of the tab location.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引標籤位置的索引值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the tab location.
Gets the index of the character that is used to display the tab leader.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來顯示定位點前置字元的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the tab leader location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，表示索引標籤的前置字元位置。</xref:System.Int32>
